title: Kamikaze pilots and Captain John Smith
itunes:title: Kamikaze pilots and Captain John Smith
itunes:subtitle: Christopher Harding analyses the motivations of the Japanese kamikaze pilots, while Peter Firstbrook describes the life of the man whose life was famously saved by Pocahontas  See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
description:
Christopher Harding analyses the motivations of the Japanese kamikaze pilots, while Peter Firstbrook describes the life of the man whose life was famously saved by Pocahontas
